column4: okay, I think I updated my xserver-xorg packages and it pretty much messed my X
now when I restart the computer Ubuntu doesn't recognize input unless I deactivate and reactivate the evdev module, and then restart the server
also, none of the terminal emulators work, anyone have any idea why?
also, ctrl-alt-backspace doesn't work anymire... I don't want to reinstall Ubuntu, in fact I wish I could revert it to my previous configuration
anyone knows if there's some sort of "revert" for APT?
did you just do a distribution upgrade?
